title: Akai Kami wa Yuuwaku no Shirushi
original_name: 赤い髪は誘惑のしるし
sinopse: Ben Radford thought Kay Napier was a fortune hunter, out to get the Endacott family fortune by posing as the long lost Kimberley Endacott. Kay just wanted to know whether or not her recently deceased mother was a kidnapper. Will the two find the answer, as well as love?
